projects.title: babyagi 2
projects.description: A framework for storing and executing functions from a database by storing metadata (description, embeddings), and dependencies. (auth keys, imports, etc.)

projects.title: ditto
projects.description: The simplest self-building coding agent (~500 lines of code) that builds itself into a multi-file Python Flask app from a simple prompt.

projects.title: babyagi 2o
projects.description: The simplest self-building autonomous agent that builds tools for itself and uses them as necessary to handle the user request. (~167 lines of code)

projects.title: ML Model Optimizer

projects.title: Data Pipeline Builder
projects.description: Designed a visual tool for building complex data pipelines without writing code.

projects.title: AI Customer Support Bot

projects.title: Visual Workflow Engine
